title: Stop the Presses
content: hed. To stop the press, you need to sneak into the basement of Baldur's Mouth. Either use Misty Step, Fly or Dimensional Door to reach the door or elevator. Or persuade/intimidate guards to let you pass.(To avoid being caught, you can jump onto the roof of Baldur's Mouth, break the barricade and jump to the elevator.)
